## Welcome to One Carat Blog

My name is Jewel Johnson and I am the creator of this blog. The blog was first made using the [`{distill}`](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/) package in R and was eventually remade using the new [`{quarto}`](https://quarto.org/) package. In this blog I write science and R-programming articles. I have also made a tutorial on data visualization and manipulation using R, and an intro to basic statistics using R, so do check them out!
